revised_title: Chaotic Behavior in Electronic Circuits: Hysteresis and Switched Circuit Dynamics
tldr: This article explores the chaotic behavior in electronic circuits, specifically focusing on a simple hysteresis and switched circuit. The authors derive an analytic formula for a one-dimensional return map, which allows them to provide a sufficient condition for chaos generation and analyze bifurcation phenomena. They also discover period-doubling bifurcation with symmetry breaking and verify some theoretical results through laboratory measurements.
